operations.title: 一键报工
operations.operateScript: (data) => { var today = new Date(); var tMonth = (today.getMonth() + 1) > 9 ? '' + (today.getMonth() + 1) : '0' + (today.getMonth() + 1); var tDay = today.getDate() > 9 ? '' + today.getDate() : '0' + today.getDate(); if (data.actual_start_date == '' || data.actual_start_date == null) { let tempPlanStartDate = new Date(data.plan_start_date); if (tempPlanStartDate > today) { tempPlanStartDate = today.getFullYear() + '/' + tMonth + '/' + tDay; } else { var aMonth = (tempPlanStartDate.getMonth() + 1) > 9 ? '' + (tempPlanStartDate.getMonth() + 1) : '0' + (tempPlanStartDate.getMonth() + 1); var aDay = tempPlanStartDate.getDate() > 9 ? '' + tempPlanStartDate.getDate() : '0' + tempPlanStartDate.getDate(); tempPlanStartDate = tempPlanStartDate.getFullYear() + '/' + aMonth + '/' + aDay; } data.actual_start_date = tempPlanStartDate; } data.complete_rate = 1; data.actual_finish_date = today.getFullYear() + '/' + tMonth + '/' + tDay; data.main_unit_actual_value = (data.plan_main_unit_value - data.complete_main_unit_value).toFixed(3); let tempSecondValue = (data.plan_second_unit_value - data.complete_second_unit_value).toFixed(3); if (tempSecondValue < 0) { tempSecondValue = 0; } data.second_unit_actual_value = tempSecondValue; }

operations.title: 一键报工
operations.operateScript: (data) => { var today = new Date(); var tMonth = (today.getMonth() + 1) > 9 ? '' + (today.getMonth() + 1) : '0' + (today.getMonth() + 1); var tDay = today.getDate() > 9 ? '' + today.getDate() : '0' + today.getDate(); if (data.actual_start_date == '' || data.actual_start_date == null) { let tempPlanStartDate = new Date(data.plan_start_date); if (tempPlanStartDate > today) { tempPlanStartDate = today.getFullYear() + '/' + tMonth + '/' + tDay; } else { var aMonth = (tempPlanStartDate.getMonth() + 1) > 9 ? '' + (tempPlanStartDate.getMonth() + 1) : '0' + (tempPlanStartDate.getMonth() + 1); var aDay = tempPlanStartDate.getDate() > 9 ? '' + tempPlanStartDate.getDate() : '0' + tempPlanStartDate.getDate(); tempPlanStartDate = tempPlanStartDate.getFullYear() + '/' + aMonth + '/' + aDay; } data.actual_start_date = tempPlanStartDate; } data.complete_rate = 1; data.actual_finish_date = today.getFullYear() + '/' + tMonth + '/' + tDay; data.main_unit_actual_value = (data.plan_main_unit_value - data.complete_main_unit_value).toFixed(3); let tempSecondValue = (data.plan_second_unit_value - data.complete_second_unit_value).toFixed(3); if (tempSecondValue < 0) { tempSecondValue = 0; } data.second_unit_actual_value = tempSecondValue; }

columnDefs.description:
主单位=无，完成率需手动录入
主单位<>无，完成率=（实际值(主单位)+已完成(主单位)）/预计值(主单位)

operations.name: disabledDate
operations.script: (current) => { let actual_start_date = relationControl.parent.value.actual_start_date; if (typeof actual_start_date === 'string') { actual_start_date = new Date(actual_start_date); } var today = new Date(); return (current > today || current < actual_start_date); }

rules.errorMessage: 完工率必须是整数，大于0小于等于100

errorMessage.zh_TW: 完工率必須是整數，大於0小於等於100
errorMessage.en_US: Completion rate must be an integer, greater than 0 and less than or equal to 100
errorMessage.zh_CN: 完工率必须是整数，大于0小于等于100

errorMessage.zh_CN: 任务未开始，实际开始日必输

errorMessage.en_US: Mission has been suspended and cannot be updated
Please enter the actual date of completion

rules.errorMessage: 完工率必须大于上一次报工

trigger.parameterScript: let canRequest=true;const params={variableName: 'progressCancel', tenantId: userInfo.tenantId, canRequest};return params;

errorMessage.zh_TW: 完工率必須大於上一次報工
errorMessage.en_US: Completion rate must be greater than the last reported work.
errorMessage.zh_CN: 完工率必须大于上一次报工

rules.errorMessage: 实际完成日不能小于实际开始日且实际完成日不能大于系统日

trigger.condition: data.actual_finish_date != '' && data.actual_finish_date != null && data.actual_start_date != '' && data.actual_start_date != null && (new Date(data.actual_finish_date) < new Date(data.actual_start_date) || new Date(data.actual_finish_date)>new Date())

errorMessage.zh_TW: 實際完成日不能小於實際開始日且實際完成日不能大於系統日
errorMessage.en_US: startdate cannot great than finishDate or sysdate
errorMessage.zh_CN: 实际完成日不能小于实际开始日且实际完成日不能大于系统日

errorMessage.zh_CN: 前置任务未完成，不可报工完成

rules.errorMessage: 完工率必须大于0且小于等于100

errorMessage.zh_TW: 完工率必須大於0且小於等於100
errorMessage.en_US: Completion rate must be greater than 0
errorMessage.zh_CN: 完工率必须大于0且小于等于100

errorMessage.en_US: Please enter a maximum of 255 characters
errorMessage.zh_CN: 已超过单次报工说明的最大长度限制！

rules.errorMessage: 进度有回退或任务已逾期，报工说明必填。

trigger.condition: (currentControl.parent.parent.parent.value.uiBot__variables.progressCancel === 'true' && currentControl.parent.get('complete_rate').value < currentControl.parent.get('complete_rate')._oldValue) || (currentControl.parent.parent.parent.value.uiBot__variables.isWorkReportRequired === 'true' && data.actual_finish_date !== '' && data.actual_finish_date !== null && new Date() > new Date(data.plan_finish_date+' 23:59:59'))

errorMessage.zh_TW: 進度有回退或任務已逾期，報工說明必填。
errorMessage.en_US: The reason for idling is required.
errorMessage.zh_CN: 进度有回退或任务已逾期，报工说明必填。

rules.errorMessage: 实际开始日不能大于系统日

trigger.condition: data.task_status === '10' && data.actual_start_date !== '' && data.actual_start_date !== null && new Date(data.actual_start_date)> new Date()

errorMessage.zh_TW: 實際開始日不能大於系統日
errorMessage.en_US: actual startdate cannot great than sysdate
errorMessage.zh_CN: 实际开始日不能大于系统日

operations.name: disabledDate
operations.script: (current) => { var today = new Date(); return (current > today); }

rules.name: 提交执行人报工总时数校验
rules.errorMessage: 执行人报工总时数不等于工时!

trigger.condition: (() => {     let workHours = data[0].work_hours;     let taskReportInfo = data[0].task_report_info;     if (typeof taskReportInfo !== 'undefined' && taskReportInfo !== null && taskReportInfo.length !== 0) {         let sumWorkHours = 0;         for (let i = 0; i < taskReportInfo.length; i++) {             sumWorkHours = utils.add(taskReportInfo[i].work_hours, sumWorkHours);             console.log(taskReportInfo[i].work_hours);         }         console.log(sumWorkHours + '  ' + workHours);         return Number(sumWorkHours) !== workHours;     } else {         return false;     } })()

errorMessage.zh_TW: 執行人報工總時數不等於工時!
errorMessage.zh_CN: 执行人报工总时数不等于工时!

errorMessage.zh_CN: 累计耗用总工时不可小于0

name.zh_CN: 校验累计耗用总工时不可小于0

rules.name: 耗用总工时已超过预计工时校验
rules.errorMessage: 工时+耗用总工时已超过预计工时

trigger.condition: (() => { if (utils.isNotEmpty(data.work_hours)) { return data.work_hours + data.total_work_hours > data.plan_work_hours; } else { return data.total_work_hours > data.plan_work_hours; } })()

errorMessage.zh_TW: 工時+耗用總工時已超過預計工時
errorMessage.en_US: 工时+耗用总工时已超过预计工时
